thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Jeff Schofield
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Jeff Schofield

author: Jeff Schofield
title: Jeff Schofield
text:
5 Star Customer service!
I have received many orders from Bangood and all of them have delivered in the time that they said they would.
Every company will make mistakes - it is how they fix the problems that keeps customers coming back. After waiting for the regular deliver period - my last order was not delivered. When I made this known to Banggood they immediately e-mailed me back and we arranged to have them re-send the order without questions or delays.
This is great customer service and will keep me buying from Banggood!
5 Star Customer Service!
